title: 🎨 Privacy Policy – Our Commitment to Your Privacy
content:
Thank you for trusting our app!

Our app is carefully designed to inspire and support young children’s creativity and learning — and we take your privacy seriously.

🔒 Privacy Overview

We do NOT collect, store, or share any personal information. There are no accounts, ads, or tracking of any kind.

Our app runs fully offline, keeping all data stored locally on your device — so your family’s information stays private and secure.

🛡️ Compliance

We comply with strict privacy laws, including COPPA and GDPR-K, to protect children’s data.

📬 Questions or Concerns?

If you have any questions about our privacy practices, feel free to contact us anytime:

📧 magicscribble@icloud.com
